language.name: English (USA)

language-info.native-language: This is the bot's native language. So it's 100% translated.
language-info.missing-translations: Translations still missing! Only {strings_percentage}% of the bot is translated!

language.switch-lang: Below, select the language you want to use.
language.switched-lang: The language of this chat has been set to {language}.

chatType.OnlyPrivate: This only works in private, not in groups.
chatType.OnlyGroup: This only works in groups, not in private.

generic-strings.admin-need-permissions: You do not have the following administrator permissions to perform this action: {permissions}
generic-strings.error-occurred:
Dear user, unfortunately a surprise error occurred:
{error}
. You can help us resolve it by submitting an issue on GitHub (https://github.com/BubbalooTeam/PyMouse/issues).

checkers.notforYou: The device model selection button listed by GSMarena is not targeted at you.

reason.deviceLister: I was returned different variations of different devices with the query {query}, choose a model from these devices using the buttons below.
reason.deviceNotProvided: The device was not provided to me. Usage: /d S24 Ultra

pm-menu.start-private: Hello {user}, I'am {bot}. A robot with cool and fun functions for your chat.
pm-menu.privacy-policy: {bot} Privacy Policy: This bot was designed and created to guarantee your security and privacy. Thank you for your trust, our organization values ‚Äã‚Äãprotecting your data and, moreover, we value quality. The current privacy policy can be updated at any time, but this change will be communicated days in advance on the news channel.
pm-menu.privacy-policyRead: Click the button below to read and open of the {bot} Privacy Policy.
pm-menu.help-below: Click the button below to open the documentation and get help of the {bot}.

reason.weatherNotProvided: The location was not provided to me. Usage: /weather (location)

checkers.noArgs: What is the video title, channel name or video URL to download?
checkers.excededLimit: You have exceeded my maximum download limit, in this case 1GB of video/music. You can choose to download in a lower resolution, or purchase one of our plans to be able to download up to 2GB of video/music.
checkers.notforYou: This YouTube Dowloader button is not directed at you.
